name: ◦ The Reconstruction of Nano Pepe ◦
description: A very smol reconstructed Nano Pepe. The Reconstruction of Nano Pepe stems from the fulfillment of a smol contract from a high-end but very smol Nano Pepe Robotics Smolporation. The order request came in after the owner of two very high-end and prized Nano Pepe's, suspected a sudden and total Pepe loss. It was later discovered the Nano Pepe's had simply been shipped to the wrong storage facility. Despite finding the Nano Pepe's the contract was upheld and two Nano Pepe's were delivered. This is one of two special Nano Pepe's. [2021] Gif by @moblyal.
